Name: Casse Noissette
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Shake or whip cream to aerate then carefully pour to FLOAT on the surface of the cocktail.
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Sip hazelnut and coffee through a creamy topping. A dessert of a drink.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2001 by Julien Escot at Hotel du Cap-Eden Roc in Cap d'Antibes (France). Casse Noisette won the overall contest at London, Drinks International Bartender's Challenge 2004.
Nutrition: One serving of Casse Noissette contains 266 calories
